nodes.text: The Skywalker Family Album is an album that was created to introduce the prominent Skywalker family, as well as a number of others related to them. It was released in April 2002, under the publication of Random House. The album was adapted by author Alice Alfonsi from Marni Taradash's original article The Skywalker Family Album on www.starwarskids.com.
The Skywalkers are one of the most important families in the galaxy.
Open this book to learn all about them.
